title: Lets go riot can we get an explanation?
body: Multiple people with the same issue on this board where are the replies.

replies.body: Talking about the authentication issues? [**We made 2 sticky posts**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/3EVNI0ag-1032017-stuck-at-authenticating-isssues), one here and one globally detailing the issues we were having and that we were investigating. Since then, they've been updated with our progress up until the issue was resolved.
